function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to UV light may cause harm to human skin and eyes.","Impact":"Risk of skin cancer, eye damage, and irritation.","Mitigation":"Use protective gear like gloves and goggles when handling UV lamps. Limit exposure and follow safety guidelines.","Technologies":"UV lamps with shielding or safety features to limit human exposure. UV monitoring sensors for safety control.","People":"Persons in the vicinity of UV lamps and those handling the equipment.","Owner":"Building management, facility maintenance staff."},{"Description":"Inequality in susceptibility to UV damage among different coronaviruses.","Impact":"Inaccurate assumptions about virus susceptibility to UV light. Misleading interpretation of UV disinfection efficacy.","Mitigation":"Conduct specific research on the susceptibility of the target virus to UV light. Use multiple sources of data for comparison and analysis.","Technologies":"Advanced UV spectroscopy and analysis tools to assess virus susceptibility. High-resolution UV irradiation chambers for testing.","People":"Researchers, microbiologists, virologists.","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions."},{"Description":"Variability in UV irradiation experiment methodologies and results.","Impact":"Inconsistent and unreliable data in UV disinfection studies. Inaccurate assessment of disinfection efficacy.","Mitigation":"Standardize UV irradiation experiment methodologies and dosages. Use controlled and replicable conditions for UV disinfection studies.","Technologies":"UV exposure chambers with standardized testing protocols. Data analysis and comparison software for UV disinfection studies.","People":"Researchers, scientists, public health experts.","Owner":"Research institutions, regulatory bodies, public health agencies."}]}
